meta.name: remotion-demo-patterns
meta.purpose: Reusable patterns extracted from a Remotion demo video build conversation.
remotion_principles: Avoid CSS animations and Tailwind animation classes.
Premount sequences when timing needs clean transitions.

patterns.title: Base composition registration
patterns.goal: Register a renderable composition with explicit dimensions and duration.
patterns.prompt_template: Create a {{width}}x{{height}} Remotion composition named {{id}} using {{component}} for {{seconds}} seconds at {{fps}} fps and register it in Root.tsx.

notes: Define width, height, fps, and durationInFrames explicitly.
Keep Root.tsx as the registry of compositions.

patterns.title: Mac terminal shell layout
patterns.goal: Create a macOS-style terminal window with title bar, traffic lights, and prompt.
patterns.prompt_template: Build a macOS terminal UI component with a title bar, traffic lights, and a prompt area. Keep the background transparent and add padding {{padding}}.

notes: Use AbsoluteFill with padding and a rounded container.
Place title bar at the top and a content area below.
Center the window and keep a neutral light theme.

patterns.title: Typewriter command animation
patterns.goal: Type a CLI command character by character.
patterns.prompt_template: Create a TerminalContent component that types "{{command}}" at {{charsPerSecond}} chars per second using useCurrentFrame and interpolate.

notes: Derive framesPerChar from fps and charsPerSecond.
Compute visibleChars via interpolate and clamp.
Render command substring up to visibleChars.

patterns.title: Blinking cursor component
patterns.goal: Blink the cursor when idle and keep it visible at the end of typing.
patterns.prompt_template: Create a Cursor component that blinks at {{blinkHz}} Hz when blinking is true and stays visible otherwise.

notes: Toggle opacity based on frame and fps.
Show cursor while typing and after typing completes.

patterns.title: Staggered terminal output
patterns.goal: Reveal terminal output after typing with a short delay and a per-line stagger.
patterns.prompt_template: After typing, wait {{delaySeconds}}s then reveal an ASCII art logo and output lines at {{lineDelayMs}}ms per line.

notes: Compute typingEndFrame, then outputStartFrame.
Use interpolate to compute visibleLines and slice the output array.
Keep content overflow hidden to avoid layout shift.

patterns.title: Master composition with 3D rotation
patterns.goal: Wrap the terminal in a master scene with perspective and subtle 3D rotation.
patterns.prompt_template: Create a Master composition that applies perspective and rotates Y from {{startDeg}} to {{endDeg}} over the full duration.

notes: Apply perspective on the parent container.
Animate rotateY across durationInFrames with interpolate.

patterns.title: Fast spring entry without bounce
patterns.goal: Bring the terminal in from the bottom with a snappy spring.
patterns.prompt_template: Make the terminal jump in from the bottom using a spring with high damping and map it to translateY from {{fromPx}} to {{toPx}}.

notes: Use spring() output (0..1) and interpolate to pixels.
Avoid CSS transitions; animate via Remotion.

patterns.title: Flip transition after output
patterns.goal: Flip the terminal toward the camera once output is complete.
patterns.prompt_template: After frame {{outputDoneFrame}}, rotateX from 0 to {{flipDeg}} with transform origin at the bottom.

notes: Drive the flip with a spring using frame - outputDoneFrame.
Wrap the terminal in a div with transformOrigin set to center bottom.

patterns.title: Logo combo composition
patterns.goal: Display brand logos with a plus sign in between.
patterns.prompt_template: Create a LogoCombo composition that shows Remotion, a plus sign, Claude Code, and OpenCode logos with tuned sizes.

notes: Store assets in public/ and load via staticFile.
Keep the background transparent for compositing.

patterns.title: Logo combo reveal with headline
patterns.goal: Show a text headline before the logo row.
patterns.prompt_template: Use Series: first show "{{headline}}" for {{headlineSeconds}} seconds, then show the logo row.

notes: Use Series to play headline then logos.
Ensure the custom font is loaded before render.

patterns.title: Logo behind terminal
patterns.goal: Reveal the logo combo behind the terminal after output completes.
patterns.prompt_template: Add LogoCombo in a Sequence that starts at frame {{startFrame}} and render it before the terminal Sequence for z-order.

notes: Order elements so LogoCombo renders before MacTerminal.
Consider premountFor for smoother entry.
